name: Gemma i Marta
desc: La Gemma i la Marta es van conèixer a la festa major del barri fa un parell d’anys, i no van tardar gaire a enamorar-se i anar a viure juntes. Fa poc van adoptar un gatet del carrer, i últimament tot gira al seu voltant. L’economia no és fàcil, però, i no tenen clar si podràn quedar-se al pis amb l’última pujada del lloguer i els sous precaris que es veuen obligades a acceptar.
descENG: Gemma and Marta met at the neighborhood festival a couple of years ago, and it didn’t take long for them to fall in love and move in together. Recently, they adopted a stray kitten, and lately, everything seems to revolve around her. The economy isn’t easy, though, and they’re not sure if they’ll be able to keep the flat with the latest rent increase and the low wages they’re forced to accept.
